CVE.summary: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Canvas implementation in Mozilla Firefox before 18.0, Firefox ESR 17.x before 17.0.2, Thunderbird before 17.0.2, Thunderbird ESR 17.x before 17.0.2, and SeaMonkey before 2.15 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an HTML document that specifies invalid width and height values.

CWE.title: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer

vFeed.Product: vFeed - The Correlated Vulnerability and Threat Database
vFeed.Author: NJ OUCHN

Oval.title: SUSE-SU-2013:0306-1 -- Security update for Mozilla Firefox

Stack-based buffer overflow in the Canvas implementation in Mozilla Firefox before 18.0, Firefox ESR 17.x before 17.0.2, Thunderbird before 17.0.2, Thunderbird ESR 17.x before 17.0.2, and SeaMonkey before 2.15 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via an HTML document that specifies invalid width and height values.
